subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer’s wait to win as a pro in the Bay Area was over on Sunday after making a tricky 4-foot par putt on the 72nd hole to ice a one-stroke victory over Song-Hee Kim.
snippet: Paula Creamer’s wait to win as a pro in the Bay Area was over on Sunday after making a tricky 4-foot par putt on the 72nd hole to ice a one-stroke victory over Song-Hee Kim.
